overview: Razorpay is India's leading payments solution provider that allows businesses to accept, process, and disburse payments with its product suite.

products.name: Payment Gateway
products.description: Accept online payments via 100+ payment modes including Credit/Debit cards, Netbanking, UPI, and Wallets.

products.name: Payment Links
products.description: Share payment links via SMS, Email, or WhatsApp and get paid immediately. No website required.

products.name: Razorpay Payroll
products.description: Automate payroll calculation and salary disbursal. Handles compliance like PF, PT, and TDS automatically.

pricing.standard: Our standard plan charges 2% per transaction for Indian Consumer Credit Cards, Netbanking, and Wallets. UPI is 0%.
pricing.setup_fee: There are Zero setup fees and Zero annual maintenance charges for the standard plan.
pricing.enterprise: For high volumes, we offer custom pricing. You would need to speak with our sales director.

faqs.question: Do you have a free tier?
faqs.answer: We don't have a 'free tier' per se, but we have a 'No Cost' setup. You only pay when you transact (2% standard fee). If you don't do any transactions, you pay nothing.

faqs.question: How long does settlement take?
faqs.answer: Standard settlement cycle is T+2 days. We also offer 'Instant Settlements' for eligible businesses to get money immediately 24x7.

faqs.question: Is documentation required?
faqs.answer: Yes, as a regulated payment aggregator, we require KYC documents like PAN, GST (if applicable), and bank account details to activate your account.

faqs.question: Who is this for?
faqs.answer: Razorpay is built for everyone from freelancers and home-businesses to large enterprises like Swiggy and Zomato.
